definition: "eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
the Yellow Emperor, mythological emperor of China, reigned c. 2697-2597 BC
child emperor/(fig.) spoiled child/spoiled boy/pampered only child
Flame Emperors (c. 2000 BC), legendary dynasty descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty (141-87 BC)
Emperor Yang of Sui (569-618), said to have murdered his father and brother to seize the throne, reigned 604-618

sentences.english: 1547- Ivan the Terrible was crowned Czar of Russia.
sentences.chinese: 1547年的今天，伊凡雷帝加冕为俄国沙皇。

sentences.english: From the Yongle Emperor onwards, 13 Ming Dynasty Emperors were buried in this area.
sentences.chinese: 自永乐帝开始，明朝十三陵共埋葬了十三位皇帝。

sentences.english: Indeed as expected emperor two male sons are more satisfied, know this kind of matter, emperor.
sentences.chinese: 果然帝二夫子更得意了，知道这种事，帝。

sentences.english: She sat at her typewriter all night tooling up the final draft.
sentences.chinese: 她整夜坐在打字机帝，校订成稿。

sentences.english: Wanli emperor decided was conferring the king of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 万历帝决定册封丰臣秀吉为日本国王。

sentences.english: On this area of the sea the pandas like to drink tea with peas in soda.
sentences.chinese: 在海里帝疋个地域，熊猫们喜欢就着苏打碗豆喝茶。

sentences.english: How did the Chinese nation's "emperor", for example Yu, govern the country?
sentences.chinese: 中华民族的“帝”如“禹”，是怎么当的？

sentences.english: God will never let them be happy, healthy and live.
sentences.chinese: 丄帝要让他们要永远快乐，緈冨，健康的活下去。

sentences.english: On the chilly hillside he is unwilling to write his will on the ten-shilling bill.
sentences.chinese: 在寒冷的山坡上他不愿意将遗嘱写在十先令帝袼单上。

sentences.english: His hearth difficult, Kings son and the son of the people also get on the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 保家卫国难啊，帝王之子和百姓之子也得上战场。

sentences.english: Emperor Ku kept his words, and allow Long Qi to marry the third princess.
sentences.chinese: 喾帝履行承诺，准许龙麒和三公主成婚。

sentences.english: He told the court that MacD's living conditions are in violation of the European Convention on Human Rights.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉法院，麦克帝的情况已经违反欧盟人权法。

sentences.english: I'll have a glass of Chianti .
Russians are, Ivan de terrible is one such person.
sentences.chinese: 俄国沙皇伊凡雷帝就是这样一个人。

sentences.english: Despite his veneration of violence, Yongle sought to defang certain parts of Ming society.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他尚武，永乐帝还是削弱了明朝社会的某些部分。

sentences.english: Who remembers the names now of the boyars Ivan the Terrible got rid of? No one.
sentences.chinese: 还有谁记得被伊凡雷帝消灭的贵族叫啥名啥？

definition: the imperial court/the government in imperial times
to murder a superior/to murder one's parent
Shengzu, temple name of the second Qing emperor, known as the Kangxi Emperor (1654-1722)/cf. 康熙[Kang1 xi1]
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
thick weeds/luxuriant growth/Illicium anisatum, a shrub with poisonous leaves/impertinent
